token.title: SquadCast Token
token.description: Get API Refresh Token on https://app.squadcast.com/user/USER_ID where USER_ID is user's ID

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Squadcast in the ISO 8601 format, i.e YYYY-MM-DDTmm:HH:ssZ. All data generated after this date will be replicated.

event_deduped.title: SquadCast Events Deduped
event_deduped.description: If set to true, it will return only the deduped events. If set to false, it will return only the non-deduped event. Otherwise it will return all the events

event_incident_id.title: SquadCast Events Incident ID
event_incident_id.description: If set it will pull all events from only this Incident. If no it pull all events from all incidents
